local_user_management_desc: Manage local users connecting to FreeGFW
add_user_desc: Add a user and share with friends so they can enjoy the freedom.
username_desc: Username is only for easy identification
no_users_yet: No users yet, start by adding one.
delete_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {username}?
connection_config_desc: Scan the QR code below with a supported client or copy the link to import the configuration.
im_newbie_desc: I am using FreeGFW for the first time or am new to circumventing censorship.
im_expert_desc: I am familiar with circumventing censorship and know the working principles and common configurations.
factory_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to factory reset? This action cannot be undone.
ssl_warning_index: Please configure SSL certificate first to encrypt your connection, otherwise your connection information may be stolen by government or man-in-the-middle.
password_warning_desc: Please set a password to protect your data.
add_link_desc: Generate invite link or enter peer's link to connect
generated_copy_send: Generated, please copy and send to peer
peer_link_desc: Enter invitation link generated by peer
no_links_yet: No links yet, start by adding one.
disconnect_confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this link?
ssl_le_desc: Configure SSL certificate to encrypt your connection, otherwise your connection information may be stolen.
email_desc: Used for Let's Encrypt to receive certificate expiration reminders.
skip_warning_desc: Skipping encryption may lead to information leakage due to potential government or man-in-the-middle attacks. Skipping encryption will disable TLS supported protocols.
config_failed_check_logs: Configuration failed, please check if domain resolution is correct, or check server logs.
